title: Trump’s Security Doctrine Leaves Europe at a Strategic Crossroads
summary: A new White House policy document formalizes President Trump’s long-held contempt for Europe’s leaders. It made clear that the continent now stands at a strategic crossroads.

title: Battlefield Picture Worsening for Ukraine as Trump Pushes Peace Plan
summary: Russian forces have advanced on several fronts recently. President Vladimir V. Putin signaled after talks with U.S. officials that he was not budging from demands.

title: Judge Halts Justice Dept. Effort to Seek New Comey Indictment
summary: The judge’s decision prevented the government until at least next Friday from having access to much of the evidence it used to secure its original indictment against Mr. Comey.

title: Have Trump’s Tariffs Gone as High as They Can Go? Businesses Hope So
summary: A wave of companies are petitioning for exemptions from the Trump administration’s high levies on foreign-made goods, saying they are hurting business and raising prices.

title: Could President Trump Bring Japan’s Tiny Cars to America? Not So Fast.
summary: Mr. Trump is pushing to approve their production in the United States.

title: In Honduras, Some Voters Were Swayed by Trump, Others Angered
summary: President Trump backed Nasry Asfura days before the Nov. 30 election and denounced his opponents. In a close race, that has potentially tipped the scales.

title: Angst Turns to Anger in Hollywood as Netflix Hooks Warner Bros.
summary: Much of the entertainment capital fears that Netflix’s deal will lead to more job losses and theater closings and fewer boundary-pushing movies.

title: What to Know About Netflix’s $83 Billion Deal for Warner Bros. Discovery
summary: The cash-and-stock deal would give the world’s largest paid streaming service expansive power over theater owners and entertainment-industry unions.

title: Australia’s Social Media Ban for Under-16s Is Coming. The Teenagers Are Skeptical.
summary: The country is trying to wean children under 16 off the likes of TikTok, Snapchat, YouTube and Instagram with a new law. The teenagers are skeptical.

title: How Australia’s Social Media Ban for Children Will Work
summary: The country is barring children under 16 from social media, with a sweeping federal law that is one of the first attempts at a nationwide regulation.

title: Everyone Wants High-Quality Clothes. That’s Become Its Own Trend.
summary: Being a smart consumer has never been easier. Influencers and the fashion industry are all taking advantage of that.

title: Ultra-Orthodox Jewish Couples on the Anxiety Around Their Wedding Night
summary: An ultra-Orthodox Jewish filmmaker asks members of her community about the silent anxieties surrounding intimacy on their wedding nights.

title: How Has Congestion Pricing Changed Your Year?
summary: The tolling program, decades in the making, has shown signs of being effective after a rocky rollout.

title: Fire in Goa, India, Kills at Least 25
summary: Officials told the Indian news media that the fire tore through a nightclub in the southwestern state of Goa, a popular tourist destination.

title: Florida Man Charged in Murder of Woman Found Near Gilgo Beach
summary: The woman’s body was found near her 2-year-old’s, and the man who was charged was the child’s father, the authorities said. The case did not appear to be linked to the Long Island serial killings.

title: Francis Ford Coppola’s F.P. Journe Sells for $11 Million at Auction
summary: Frenzied bidding pushed the polarizing F.P. Journe timepiece into near-record territory despite one dealer calling the design “goofy.”
